origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketDataAPI.get_gdp_growth', 'description': 'This function provides the GDP growth rate for specified countries in a given year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'countries', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of countries for which the GDP growth rate is requested.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the GDP growth rate is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'growth_rates', 'description': 'A dictionary mapping each country to its GDP growth rate.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketDataAPI.get_gdp_growth, 它的参数输入如下: 'countries'是['Brazil', 'India', 'China', 'South Africa'], 'year'是'2023'.
